argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | funciso.b | |- B = ( Base ` D ) |
| 2 |  | funciso.s | |- I = ( Iso ` D ) |
| 3 |  | funciso.t | |- J = ( Iso ` E ) |
| 4 |  | funciso.f | |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) |
| 5 |  | funciso.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | funciso.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | funciso.m | |- ( ph -> M e. ( X I Y ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` E ) = ( Base ` E ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` E ) = ( Inv ` E ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( F ( D Func E ) G <-> <. F , G >. e. ( D Func E ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> <. F , G >. e. ( D Func E ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_funcrcl | |- ( <. F , G >. e. ( D Func E ) -> ( D e. Cat /\ E e. Cat ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( D e. Cat /\ E e. Cat ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) |
| 15 | 1, 8, 4 | #P_funcf1 | |- ( ph -> F : B --> ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 16 | 15, 5 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) e. ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 6 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( F ` Y ) e. ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` D ) = ( Inv ` D ) |
| 19 | 13 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) |
| 20 | 1, 18, 19, 5, 6, 2 | #P_isoval | |- ( ph -> ( X I Y ) = dom ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ) |
| 21 | 7, 20 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ph -> M e. dom ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ) |
| 22 | 1, 18, 19, 5, 6 | #P_invfun | |- ( ph -> Fun ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_funfvbrb | |- ( Fun ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) -> ( M e. dom ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) <-> M ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ( ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ` M ) ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( M e. dom ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) <-> M ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ( ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ` M ) ) ) |
| 25 | 21, 24 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> M ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ( ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ` M ) ) |
| 26 | 1, 18, 9, 4, 5, 6, 25 | #P_funcinv | |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ( ( F ` X ) ( Inv ` E ) ( F ` Y ) ) ( ( Y G X ) ` ( ( X ( Inv ` D ) Y ) ` M ) ) ) |
| 27 | 8, 9, 14, 16, 17, 3, 26 | #P_inviso1 | |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) e. ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ) |
